correctness.description: Accuracy of the final answer provided.

completeness.description: The extent to which all required steps are fulfilled in the solution.

efficiency.description: The optimality of the steps taken in solving the question (e.g., number of steps, time taken).

comprehension.description: The agent's ability to understand and interpret the problem correctly.

reasoning_traceability.description: Ability to follow the reasoning process of the agent step by step.

answer_clarity.description: Clarity of the communication in the provided answer.

use_of_resources.description: Appropriate use of resources, e.g., whether the agent required unnecessary information or teammates.

response_time.description: The amount of time taken from receiving the question to providing the answer.

relevance_of_output.description: The relevance and applicability of the solution to the given problem.

innovativeness.description: The level of creativity and uniqueness in the solution approach.
